work.title: Content Leader
work.description: Responsible for strategic accounts and content and social media projects management for brands such as Randstad, Instituto SulAmérica, Ambev, and Hospital Sírio Libanês.

work.title: Content Marketing Manager
work.description:
Development and implementation of digital strategies for clients.
• Managed and oversaw the content team.
• Actively collaborated with the company's Business & AdSales team on strategy development and upselling projects.
• Expertise in budget management.
• Skillful oversight of the technical content production team.
• Ensured brand success through marketing and SEO strategies.

work.title: Content Strategy Manager
work.description:
Experienced team leader responsible for the management and development of coordinators and analysts on the content marketing and social media team.
• Expertise in formulating effective content strategies and leveraging paid amplification for successful campaign outcomes.
• Proficient in actively monitoring and optimizing social media channel performance.
• Skilled in utilizing insights and data analysis to enhance account performance and provide recommendations for improvement.
• Worked with clients such as Mary Kay, EcoRodovias, Diageo, Platos, and Órigo.
• Proficient in tools including Google Data Studio, Sprinklr, Stilingue, MLabs, Buzzmonitor, Hootsuite, Meltwater, and Google Analytics.

work.title: Content & Social Media Coordinator
work.description:
Responsible for developing content strategies and digital presences for brands.
• Definition of brand messages, tones of voice, and personas.
• Management of content teams for blogs and social media.
• Data analysis and monitoring of specific campaigns and Always On initiatives.
• Development and implementation of content strategies to enhance brand presence.
• Ensuring that established KPIs are met and brand guidelines are followed in all publications.

work.title: Social Media Coordinator
work.description:
Social media team coordination at Catraca Livre, overseeing content production on social platforms.
• People management and training, empowering team members with the skills and knowledge required for project success.
 • Interface with commercial clients, coordinating and collaborating with external partners to ensure successful project execution.
 • Leadership in editorial projects and supervision of the development and implementation of content strategies and plans.
• Accountability for internal department goals and external commercial projects, ensuring the achievement of established targets.

work.title: Social Media Analyst
work.description:
As a content team coordinator, I was responsible for the construction and development of strategies and digital presences for various brands through content strategies to defining brand messages, tones of voice, and personas. I also managed content production teams for blogs and social networks, and monitored and analyzed data from specific campaigns and Always On initiatives.
• Developing content strategies and brand presences for clients from different industries.
• Managing content production teams for blogs and social networks.
• Monitoring results to ensure established KPIs were achieved and brand guidelines were followed in all publications.
• Analyzing data from specific campaigns and Always On initiatives through monthly, quarterly, and semi-annual reports.
• Monitoring the health of brands on social networks using social listening strategies, sentiment measurement, and competitor monitoring.

work.title: Journalist and Social Media
work.description:
Development and implementation of content production strategies and social marketing plans for agency clients.
• Expertise in fashion and beauty production for filming, ensuring that content is visually engaging and effective.
• Implementation of campaigns through social media platforms such as Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, and Google.
• Analysis of metrics, preparation of monthly reports, and presentation of results to clients and stakeholders.
Clients: C.Kamura (Celso Kamura), Natura, B.drops, and Bioart Biocosmetics.

work.title: Journalist
work.description:
• Content production for the magazine, social media, and website.
• Provide support during fashion and beauty shootings, ensuring the smooth and efficient execution of every aspect of the production process.

work.title: Journalist
work.description:
• Content production for online and print magazines in the beauty, health, and fitness sectors.
• Organization and support in production of fashion and beauty editorials, ensuring that all aspects of the production run smoothly and efficiently.
